name: Who is scared of the Wullimann
name_original: Who is scared of the Wullimann
description:
"Who is Scared of the Wulliman" is a Horrorgame focused on small Puzzles

You as the Protagonist get locked into a basement by your Friend. What both of you dont know is that this Basement is Home to an old Myth the "Wulliman".

Even though he is Blind, he is able to hunt you down because of his sense of hearing. Dont make a Sound!

Use your Flashlight to navigate through the Basement. Feeling lost? Switch to your UV Light to find Hints.

Solve all Puzzles to escape the Basement without encountering the Wulliman
